::Zardus/Panzertron::

Zardus glances out of a window of the shuttle, his mind wandering. The rest 
few minutes had been spent in silence between him and Panzertron, as they had 
simply ran out of things to discuss.

Zardus' mind wonders about Feline and Skulletron, and whether they were doing 
their mission. He frowns. They should have had plenty of time to accomplish 
it by now, he'd have to visit the Maximals later to see if they were allright.

A voice behind him interrupted his thoughts, jerking him back to reality. "We 
are here," it was Panzertron's voice.

Zardus nods as the shuttle touches down on the island of the Iron Fist, both 
bots walking out.
